channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaving rubbish on footpath, 7th November
item.description:
New residents moved in and been leaving there rubbish here for weeks now and it’s not getting moved by the bin men. The persons in the house needs to be shown how to use there bins

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chilver Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing commercial waste building, 7th November
item.description:
Commercial waste bin in alley next to 37 Kersley Road n16 0NT is overflowing and won't close. Bin is used by the restaurant Escocesa (67 stoke newington church street, n16 0ar)
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stoke Newington Church Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping around the bin store on Long Walk - Nightingale Place end, 7th November
item.description:
A bath has been dumped on the grass opposite the Long Walk bin store and some other household rubbish including what looks like a clothes drying rack has been dumped on the grass next to the bin store.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Long Walk, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Rubbish dumped at Heverham Road, 7th November
item.description:
Every week someone dumps black bags full of rubbish in this area. The rubbish consists of food and household waste so I know these people live around this area. It's disgusting and makes the area very unhygeinic. It also attracts flies and wild animals. Please can this be investigated.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Reidhaven Road, Plumstead, London
